info.name: Purra Electronics E-Commerce APIs (Role-Based Routes)
info.description: Complete Postman collection for Purra Electronics E-Commerce project with role-based routes: /admin for admin, /user for public, /customer for customers, /retailer for retailers. Covers all features with full CRUD operations and variables.

body.raw:
{
    "product_id": "{{product_id}}",
    "product_variant_id": "{{product_variant_id}}",
    "user_id": "{{user_id}}",
    "rating": 4,
    "title": "Great product",
    "review": "This is an excellent product. I highly recommend it.",
    "is_verified_purchase": true,
    "review_action": "approve"
}

request.description: Create a new product review (admin can create on behalf of users)
Update a review (admin can update any review)
Change review status (approve, reject, flag, pending)
Delete a review (admin only)

item.description: Admin endpoints for managing product reviews

body.raw:
{
    "product_id": "{{product_id}}",
    "product_variant_id": "{{product_variant_id}}",
    "rating": 4,
    "title": "Great product",
    "review": "This is an excellent product. I highly recommend it.",
    "is_verified_purchase": true
}

request.description: Create a new product review (requires authentication)
Get all reviews for a product (with optional filtering for approved reviews only)
Get a specific review by ID
Update a review (only by the reviewer)
Delete a review (only by the reviewer)
Get all reviews by the authenticated user
